education.institution: Quantic School of Business and Technology

highlights: Contribute embedded systems code for logic controllers and ensure that all Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) standards and success criteria are met.
Develop best practices and security standards for the local org.
Test control systems software for bugs and operating speeds, and documenting processes.
Managed high hazard chemical plant operations with ~40 direct reports consisting of operators and engineers and led process improvement.
Managed performance of direct reports through goal setting, measurement, and 1-on-1â€™s.
Recruited, built, and coached cross-functional teams.
Successfully led software development for a $1.8M project to implement a new product using existing infrastructure, which included managing a 5-member, core project team.
Provided automation and control systems expertise for building designs as lead consultant/ subject matter expert on $27M new facility installation project.
Participated in international, new-product development team that developed relationships cross-culturally to share technology.
Implemented a $3M software/hardware migration project, replacing a Modicon PLC/HMI system with an ABB 800xA DCS, redesign of the backend framework.
Completed a Six Sigma Green Belt certification project with $57k/year savings by optimizing legacy box filling code.

projects.description: A proven leader and continuous learner. My passion is for building cool products, developing new relationships, and learning new technologies. I love working on challenges, communicating complex ideas to non-technical stakeholders, and creating elegant solutions.
